channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Lion Controls -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Lion Controls -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-42770|2024-08-02T19:30:24.517Z -- red%20lion%20controls -- st-ipm-8460
item.description: Red Lion SixTRAK and VersaTRAK Series RTUs with authenticated users enabled (UDR-A) any Sixnet UDR message will meet an authentication challenge over UDP/IP. When the same message is received over TCP/IP the RTU will simply accept the message with no authentication challenge.

item.title: CVE-2023-40151|2024-08-02T18:24:55.459Z -- red%20lion%20controls -- st-ipm-8460
item.description: When user authentication is not enabled the shell can execute commands with the highest privileges. Red Lion SixTRAK and VersaTRAK Series RTUs with authenticated users enabled (UDR-A) any Sixnet UDR message will meet an authentication challenge over UDP/IP. When the same message comes over TCP/IP the RTU will simply accept the message with no authentication challenge.
